mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_NOTICE ( PRODUCT_NOTICE_ID, PRODUCT_ID, TITLE, PRODUCT_NOTICE_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_NOTICE_TYPE, CREATED_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{productNoticeId}, #{productId}, #{title}, #{productNoticeContent}, #{memberId}, #{productNoticeType}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PRODUCT_NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, PRODUCT_NOTICE_CONTENT = #{productNoticeContent}, PRODUCT_NOTICE_TYPE = #{productNoticeType}, UPDATED_ID = #{memberId}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_NOTICE_ID = #{productNoticeId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NOTICE_ID, PRODUCT_ID, TITLE, PRODUCT_NOTICE_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_NOTICE_TYPE, CREATED_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createdDate, UPDATED_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS updatedDate FROM TB_PRODUCT_NOTICE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
